# prime_days

enumerates prime number dates(YYYYMMDD form) of specific year.

## Usage

```bash
$ go run main.go 2016
20160319
20160401
20160403
20160529
20160601
20160607
20160611
20160709
20160727
20160809
20160817
20160821
20160923
20161007
20161013
20161019
20161021
20161027
20161103
```

### --group option

Group output by month (one line per month, space-separated):

```bash
$ go run main.go --group 2016
19 prime dates in 2016:


20160319
20160401 20160403
20160529
20160601 20160607 20160611
20160709 20160727
20160809 20160817 20160821
20160923
20161007 20161013 20161019 20161021 20161027
20161103

```
